game.title: The Lost Sword
game.objective: Find and Retrieve the Lost Legendary Sword
game.description: Legends tell of a powerful sword lost in the Forbidden Forest. Many will be grateful with its return.

task.description: Find the map of Forbidden Forest in the King's library that marks the location of the sword.
Fight and defeat the guardian of the forest to reach the sword.
Retrieve the legendary sword and return to the King at Castle Gate.
